projects.name: Ray Tracer
projects.subtitle: A project written in Rust
projects.description: This project is an implementation of the 'Ray Tracing in a Weekend' series by Peter Shirley, adapted to the Rust programming language.

projects.name: Garden Organizer
projects.subtitle: A tool for gardeners by gardeners
projects.description: This application is designed to help users organize their garden. It allows users to add plants, create a garden layout, and track the growth of their plants.

projects.name: Task Manager
projects.subtitle: A complete project built with TS
projects.description: A web application that allows users to manage their tasks. It lets users filter tasks by status and importance, in addition to the usual CRUD operations. With color coding, users can easily identify the status of each task.

projects.name: URL Shortener
projects.subtitle: A web app using an API
projects.description: A simple but efficient URL shortener built with React. It's designed to quickly generate shortened URLs and provide a user-friendly interface.

projects.name: Dummy Commands
projects.subtitle: Recreating commands using Node.js
